main.title: Hello, I am Chen, Yu-Cheng.
main.name: Chen, Yu-Cheng
main.bio:
My dream is to be a front-end engineer.
In my second year of college, I took a programming course, the teacher taught us the basic concept of programming and some techniques. In this course, I realized programming is powerful, also, it makes our lives more convenient. So I applied what I had learned to make a visual novel in another class, which was built with Processing and JavaScript, and this project was well-received by external assessors, and our team won second place.
The experience above inspired me to be an engineer, so I started to learn front-end development, I was not only learned it from school, but also from books and technical documents on the Internet. To make use of what I had learned, I applied for an internship in my third summer vacation, learning how to use React.js and developing a data service system with backend engineers. In my senior year, I was an intern in another company, helping them maintain the e-commerce platform, besides, I built a map for the Singaporeans to pick up with Vue.js. Besides, I took courses such as data structure and algorithm to improve my ability.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.description: In my third year of college, I applied for double majors. In this department, I understood how to make a Bluetooth boat by Arduino, video games built with JavaScript, etc.
I learned the appreciation and exploration of traditional Chinese literature in college.

work.title: ACCESS Co., Ltd

Selling and maintaining the products on the e-commerce platform, the owners include Perfect One, Calpis and JIMOS.

Building the map with Vue and OpenStreetMap, for the Singaporean search where can they take the goods.
Build an automated tool with Vue.js and Puppeteer, for the company members to cancel bad orders.
Unit testing the company's latest shopping system with Jest and Vue Test Utils.

Helping front-end engineer to build Xnet Analytics system for the company to get funding from the SBIR program.
Making webpages for advertising and selling the new book of the company.
I took a meeting minutes of a meeting.
During the internship, I used React, React Router, jQuery and ECharts, etc.

main.title: 您好，我是陳昱丞
main.name: 陳昱丞
main.bio:
我的夢想，是成為一位前端工程師。
大二上，我修了一門程式設計課，課程中以 Processing 學習程式設計的概念和技術。從中我體悟程式的強大功能和應用層面的廣泛，因此我在一堂通識的專案中，將Processing和JavaScript結合，設計一個網頁版的視覺小說型遊戲，並於期末展演時獲得校外評審的讚賞，在校外評審獎中也得到第二名的成績。
上述的經驗啟發我的工程師夢想，於是我開始學習前端相關技術，除了修習學校的數位內容學程的相關課程外，私底下也會研讀書籍和蒐集網路資料來充實自己。為了應用所學並結合實務，我在大三暑假開始實習，使用 React.js 與後端工程師開發數據服務系統。大四學期間，在另一間公司協助電商平台的維護，以及用 Vue.js 製作新加坡取貨地圖。此外，為了強化自身技能，我也去修習政大資科系的資料結構、演算法課程，努力朝著成為前端工程師的夢想邁進。
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

education.degree: 數位內容與科技學士學位學程
education.description: 大三時我申請此學程。課程中除了教導對科技和藝術相關的知識，還有許多專案，故我學會用 Maya 建模、使用 After Affect 做動畫、 Arduino 做藍芽遙控船，以及用 JavaScript 做網頁遊戲。
在大學中我學習文學鑑賞和如何對古文進行章句、聲韻和詞彙的研究。

skills.name: HTML, SCSS
skills.description: 熟悉 HTML 標籤和 CSS 語法，可徒手刻響應式網頁。

skills.description: 理解核心概念如推升和閉包，也熟悉常用的 ES6 以上的語法。

skills.name: TypeScript
skills.description: 能使用常用的資料型態、類型宣告，以對專案進行靜態型別檢查。

skills.name: React.js
skills.description: 我的幾項專案是用 React 打造，故熟悉其生命週期、JSX 語法和 hooks。

skills.name: Redux, React Router
skills.description: 有基本觀念， 可以使用這些函式庫建立 SPA 頁面。

skills.name: Vue, Vuex, Vue Router
skills.description: 理解其模板語法和 API，有稍微研究其核心原理。

skills.name: Webpack
skills.description: 有能力搭配所需要的 loaders 來啟動 React 專案。

skills.name: Jest, Enzyme
skills.description: 能使用 Jest 進行基本單元測試和計算覆蓋率，並配合 Enzyme 將 React.js 轉為 HTML 結構以測試

skills.name: PHP
skills.description: 可以做 API 供前端串接資料，並使用 PDO 與資料庫做連接。

skills.name: MySQL
skills.description: 過去使用 phpMyAdmin 操作，對於 SQL 新、修、刪和複雜的查詢語法有一定的了解。

skills.name: MongoDB
skills.description: 對 NoSQL 和其語法有粗淺認識和短暫操作經驗。

skills.name: Git
skills.description: 了解其基本觀念，可於終端機上操作。

skills.name: GIMP, Photoshop, Illustrator, After Effect
skills.description: 可以透過這些軟體來修圖、畫插圖和做動畫，以此點綴網站。

協助電商平台的購物車商品上架與後續維護，業主涵蓋新日本製藥、可爾必思、JIMOS 等。

使用 Node.js 的 Puppeteer 自動化操作 CROS 系統取消訂單。
使用 Jest 和 Vue Test Utils 對購物車進行單元測試。
